title: [K-12] Workshop on Fostering Scientific Learning Attitudes Based on Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Experiential learning utilizing VR-based simulations in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners improve their self-efficacy in science activities by more than 20%.
Learners recognize the relevance of science learning through computational thinking-based problem-solving processes by more than 80%.
Learners can explain at least three personal and social factors influencing the formation of science learning attitudes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
